title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 12 May 2009 - XWiki
content:
sdumitriu - (12/05/2009 00:01): rrodriguez: Replied to your mail  
rrodriguez - (12/05/2009 00:02): Thanks.  
rrodriguez - (12/05/2009 00:04): I'll follow the thread. I can not reach this box now. I do hope to be able to try again tomorrow.  
sdumitriu - (12/05/2009 00:05): The idea is that on a fresh download it works fine  
sdumitriu - (12/05/2009 00:05): And the only way to throw this exception is if the list of properties does not match the class  
sdumitriu - (12/05/2009 00:05): So either the sheet is OK, but the class wasn't updated (very unlikely), or the sheet is wrong  
rrodriguez - (12/05/2009 00:12): I asume the default XAR includes the whole administration application, doesn't it?  
sdumitriu - (12/05/2009 00:12): Yes  
rrodriguez - (12/05/2009 00:12): ok  
rrodriguez - (12/05/2009 00:13): I'll try again ASAP. This box is not accessible from my current location. I will keep the concerned thread updated!  
rrodriguez - (12/05/2009 00:14): Do you figure out any reason why the sheet is not updated in a fresh installation (after removing the MySQL schema and the whole webapps folder under Tomcat)  
rrodriguez - (12/05/2009 00:14): ?  
sdumitriu - (12/05/2009 00:14): No  
rrodriguez - (12/05/2009 00:15): OK. I will try again and document all an each step. Thanks!

SantiagoEgido joined #xwiki at 14:39  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:39): Hello  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:40): I am having a little problem  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:40): I'd like to modify a file in a bundle (a translation file)  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:41): I can call doc.setContent, but there seems to be no way to indicate which file it is I want to modify  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:41): Is there a way to do this?  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:41): An alternative would be to use the editor  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:42): I have been able to edit the file I want to modify with the text I want to insert, but now the problem is that if this text contains special characters, the editor does funny things   
tachirei left at 14:43 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 14:43  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:43): for instance, a comment line like "# comment" gets transformed into a paragraph, with <ol><li> tags  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:43): So, is there a way to tell the editor not to transform the "content" argument it receives in the URL?  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:44): Thanks  
lucaa left at 14:45 ("Leaving.")  
jvelociter - (12/05/2009 14:45): SantiagoEgido: you are passing content throught the URL ?  
SantiagoEgido left at 14:45 ("Advanced IRC 1.32: don't ask, don't tell.")  
SantiagoEgido joined #xwiki at 14:47  
marta\_ - (12/05/2009 14:49): SantiagoEgido: #set($myTranslationDoc = $xwiki.getDocument('Space.DocName'))  
marta\_ - (12/05/2009 14:49): $myTranslationDoc.setContent...  
marta\_ - (12/05/2009 14:50): or, for direct editing, surround all the content with {pre} {/pre}  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:50): Ok  
marta\_ - (12/05/2009 14:51): and never use the wysiwyg for editing bundles  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:51): This is velocity, right?  I guess I can adapt it to Groovy  
marta\_ - (12/05/2009 14:51): yes, it's velocity  
SantiagoEgido - (12/05/2009 14:52): Ok, thak you very much  
marta\_ - (12/05/2009 14:52): you're welcome

arunreddy\_ - (12/05/2009 17:04): marta\_: How to translate the document into a different language.   
marta\_ - (12/05/2009 17:07): if the wiki is multilingual, you have, in edit mode, links to translations in the Document information panel on the right  
marta\_ - (12/05/2009 17:08): to make the wiki multilingual go to Administration -> administer wiki -> General  
arunreddy\_ - (12/05/2009 17:09): yeah i did.  
arunreddy\_ - (12/05/2009 17:09): i changed multilingual to yes  
arunreddy\_ - (12/05/2009 17:09): what all languages are supported  
arunreddy\_ - (12/05/2009 17:09): can i write a document in english and translate it to some other language  
sdumitriu - (12/05/2009 17:09): Yes  
sdumitriu - (12/05/2009 17:10): You should also put some values for the available languages  
sdumitriu - (12/05/2009 17:10): en,fr,de,ru  
anamarias - (12/05/2009 17:12): the translation is made by the users ?  
rrodriguez left at 17:12 ()  
arunreddy\_ - (12/05/2009 17:13): sdumitriu: Thanks a lot, its working.

arunreddy\_ - (12/05/2009 19:49): whats the page responsible for the Document Information   
sdumitriu - (12/05/2009 19:49): The tab on the bottom of the page?  
arunreddy\_ - (12/05/2009 19:49): yes ..   
arunreddy\_ - (12/05/2009 19:49): comments, attachments, history, INFORMATIOn  
sdumitriu - (12/05/2009 19:50): /templates/informationinline.vm  
arunreddy\_ - (12/05/2009 19:51): ok
